title: A highly crystalline donor enables over 17% efficiency for small-molecule organic solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,3927-3936
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00400K, Paper
Tao Zhang, Cunbin An, Pengqing Bi, Kaihu Xian, Zhihao Chen, Jingwen Wang, Ye Xu, Jiangbo Dai, Lijiao Ma, Guanlin Wang, Xiaotao Hao, Long Ye, Shaoqing Zhang, Jianhui Hou
A highly crystalline donor B2 was synthesized, and an outstanding PCE of 17.1% was achieved with a low energy loss of 0.579 eV for small-molecule organic solar cells.
